videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: This is THE END of the Aetherdrift Standard format ... for me
videos.description:
The blue / white control video I am playing today on Standard Mythic ladder is honestly the only Standard deck I enjoy that the moment. Here it is, and if you decide to watch the Brawl, Commander, and collab content, thank you! If you only watch the Standard content, I still love you, and I'll see you in Tarkir: Dragonstorm.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/rAv8NCSK0EKjJ0j5OSFRkw
